I  have contributed to two cross-sectional studies investigating the prevalence of AMR in chicken farms in Malaysia. This work has been led by [Abdinasir Osman {{< ai orcid >}}](https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3172-5912) and [Sharifo Ali-Elmi {{< ai orcid >}}](https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4482-9182).

  1. Antimicrobial Resistance Patterns and Risk Factors Associated with *Salmonella spp.* Isolates from Poultry Farms in the East Coast of Peninsular Malaysia: A Cross-Sectional Study [@osman_antimicrobial_2021]. Available from [*pathogens*](https://www.mdpi.com/2076-0817/10/9/1160).
  2. Identification of Risk Factors Associated with Resistant *Escherichia coli* Isolates from Poultry Farms in the East Coast of Peninsular Malaysia: A Cross Sectional Study [@elmi_identification_2021]. Available from [*antibiotics*](https://www.mdpi.com/2079-6382/10/2/117).
